mapper.insert: insert into takeout_reserved_list (user_id, reserved_name, reserved_phone, reserved_date, reserved_time, total_price) values (#{userId},#{reservedName},#{reservedPhone},#{reservedDate},#{reservedTime},#{totalPrice})
insert into takeout_reserved_menu (takeout_id,menu_name, menu_cnt) values ((SELECT max(takeout_id) from takeout_reserved_list),#{menuName}, #{menuCnt})
